## Codebook


```{r cars, results='asis'}
load("data/ess1_8_list.Rdata")

this <- ess1_8_list  %>% 
  purrr::map(~{
    .x %>% 
      dplyr::select(dplyr::matches(c("imbgeco|imdfetn|impcntr|imsmetn|imueclt|imwbcnt|gvrfgap|eimpcnt|imbleco|imdetbs|imdetmr|imsclbn|imtcjob|imwbcrm|qfimchr|qfimcmt|qfimedu|qfimlng|qfimwht|qfimwsk|rfgbfml|rfgfrpc")))
    }
  ) %>% 
   purrr::map(~{
     sjPlot::view_df(.x, hide.progress = T, use.viewer = F, no.output = T, show.labels = T, show.frq = T, show.prc = T)
     })
```
